item.value: The explosion of Mount Tambora in Indonesia in 1815 has been called the loudest sound ever heard by humans.
The Earth orbits the Sun at an average speed of 29.79 km/s ( 67,000 miles/hour).
The tallest building in America is the Willius Tower in Chicago.
The Population of the Earth is about 6,800,000,000 (6.80 billion). China has the most people, its population is 1.3 billion.
China has more than 350 million telephones, the most of any other country. The United States is second with 268 million.

The original Olympic Games were a series of athletic competitions held in Ancient Greece. In the Summer of 1896 the first modern Olympics was held in Athens, Greece. The 2012 Olympics will be held in London.
The Pacific Ocean is the largest ocean in the world. It covers about 1/3 of its surface.
The earth is the 3rd planet from the sun and is the 5th largest planet in our solar system. Jupiter is the largest planet.
Alexander Graham Bell is credited with inventing the first telephone in 1876.
Atari releases Pong, the first commercial video game on November 29, 1972.
There are 195 countries in the world and there are more than 2,700 languages.
The tallest person in the world was Robert Wadlow. He was 2.72 meters ( 8ft 11in ) tall. The tallest woman was Zeng Jinlian. She was 2.48 meters ( 8ft 2in ) tall.
The blue whale is the largest known animal on Earth. The second largest animal is the Afican elephant.
On April 30, 1789, George Washington became the first President of the United States.
English is the second most spoken language in the world.
In 1932 Amelia Earhart became the first woman to do a solo transatlantic flight. She flew from Harbor Grace, Newfoundland, to Ireland in approximately 15 hr.
Mount Everest is the tallest mountain in the world. It is 8850 meters (29035ft) high.
In 1972 Ray Tomlinson at BBN developed the first e-mail program. In his first email to himself, he uses the @ sign. This was the first time it appeared in an e-mail address.
If you could travel from Earth to the Sun in a plane it would take you 17 years
The banana tree is not actually a tree, it is a herb. It bears fruit once a year and then dies.
